sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SCHINUS, in botany: A genus of the decandria order, belonging to the dicecia claſs of plants; and in the natural method ranking under the 43d order, Dumoſr. The male calyx is quinquefid; the petals five. The female flower is the ſame as in the male; the berry tricoccous.
